QuestData.Title: Shadehound Armor Plating
QuestData.Description:
<The salvaged piece of plating is covered in runes that slowly shift and flow across its surface.
Ve'nari would be interested in studying this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Shadehound Armor Plating to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
An interesting artifact indeed, Maw Walker.
<Ve'nari gently taps the armor.>
You can almost hear the screams of the souls who were consumed to forge it.
